articles.title: Man who tried to shoot Trump at a Florida golf course gets life in prison
articles.description:
US District Judge Aileen Cannon pronounced Ryan Routh’s fate in the same Fort Pierce courtroom that erupted into chaos in September when he tried to stab himself shortly after jurors found him guilty on all counts.

The post Man who tried to shoot Trump at a Florida golf course gets life in prison appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Ryan Routh received a life sentence for attempting to shoot Trump at a Florida golf course.
US District Judge Aileen Cannon announced the sentence in Fort Pierce on February 4, 2026.
The incident raises concerns about security measures for high-profile events in Boston and beyond.

articles.title: Trump’s border czar pulling 700 immigration officers out of Minnesota immediately
articles.description:
About 700 federal officers will be withdrawn immediately after state and local officials agreed over the past week to cooperate by turning over arrested immigrants, Tom Homan said.

The post Trump’s border czar pulling 700 immigration officers out of Minnesota immediately appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: About 700 federal immigration officers will be withdrawn from Minnesota immediately.
Tom Homan announced the withdrawal after local officials agreed to cooperate on immigration arrests.
This move may affect immigration enforcement strategies in nearby states, including Massachusetts.

articles.title: Porter Airlines is increasing service between Boston and Canada
articles.description:
The new service begins May 14.

The post Porter Airlines is increasing service between Boston and Canada appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Porter Airlines will increase flights between Boston and Canada starting May 14.
The new service aims to enhance travel options for Boston residents.
Increased connectivity may boost local tourism and business exchanges with Canada.

articles.title: Healey signs collaboration agreement with Denmark amid Greenland tensions
articles.description:
The deal aims to deepen Massachusetts’ ties with Denmark in science, technology, and trade.

The post Healey signs collaboration agreement with Denmark amid Greenland tensions appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Governor Healey signed a collaboration agreement with Denmark on February 4, 2026.
The agreement focuses on enhancing Massachusetts' science, technology, and trade relations.
Local businesses may benefit from increased trade opportunities and innovation partnerships.

articles.title: Traveling to Super Bowl LX? Here’s what to see and do in Santa Clara.
articles.description:
From scenic green spaces and public art to a culinary trail and an amusement park, there's plenty to explore.

The post Traveling to Super Bowl LX? Here’s what to see and do in Santa Clara. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Explore Santa Clara's scenic parks and public art during Super Bowl LX.
Visit local culinary trails and amusement parks for family-friendly activities.
Boston residents traveling can enjoy diverse attractions beyond the game.
